### Failure Analysis (What Could Stop Us?)

```
1. CRITICAL INFRASTRUCTURE FAILURE
   Probability: <0.1%
   Mitigation: Redundant systems, backup procedures
   Recovery: <1 hour

2. ENTIRE TEAM UNAVAILABLE
   Probability: <0.05%  
   Mitigation: Backup team trained and ready
   Recovery: Team activation + timeline extension

3. DATA LOSS EVENT
   Probability: <0.01%
   Mitigation: Archive backup + version control
   Recovery: Complete restoration from backup

4. MAJOR TECHNICAL BLOCKER
   Probability: 5%
   Mitigation: Detailed troubleshooting guides
   Recovery: <4 hour resolution
```
